column1: #text=I love going to the library to check out books .
#text=It is probably one of my favorite places to go to , since I 'm a fairly avid reader .
#text=Anyway , I 'll usually bike to the library and bring a backpack with me so that I can easily bring my books home .
#text=The last time I went , I was looking for some books on local folklore for a class that I 'm taking .
#text=I quickly went to one of the computer search stations and typed in the last name of an author that I knew had written a book on the subject .
#text=I got back a couple more results than I had expected , so I made note of them .
#text=Then , I searched by just the topic of folklore , along with the tribe that I was covering .
#text=I found several books that looked like they might be interesting .
#text=So , I took the numbers for where they would be and headed off towards the Stacks .
#text=I followed the numbers to the different rows and picked up the books that I needed , as well as a couple other books that also sounded interesting .
#text=My arms full , I took them all to the checkout counter , where a nice older man scanned them and gave me a printed receipt that said when I would need to have them back by .
#text=All in all , it was a pretty productive trip to the library .
